home.headline: Welcome to cats opinion blog!
home.p1: On this blog we write everything cat related incorporation with Vilma.
home.p2: Our blog is a little weird because it is produced with my cat, Vilma! Vilma is a very active cat. She has taken her place as the manager and brains behind this whole project.
home.p3: We blog about our personal events, sometimes we look behind scenes and of course cat stuff! Cat stuff includes cat history, cat behaviour and also cat care tips and tricks. We also have appz section where we publish small browser based “apps” to play and learn more about cats!
home.p4: Our page is relatively new and it was officially launched 10.3.2021! Jump aboard right at the beginning and follow our journey!
home.h4: Also you can contact me or Vilma at the contact page. Follow us on Facebook and Twitter links are below!

formPage.headline: Send questions for vilma or other feedback about the website. Please report bugs and broken links too!
formPage.noSpecialChar: Please do not use any special characters that prevent form sending!
formPage.emaillaceholder: Fill only if you want answer
formPage.errorWhenSendingMail: There was an internal error, we suggest sending a direct email to dev@catsopinion.com.
formPage.errorInFilling: There were illegal characters in your form or our bot detection thinks you are bot, refresh the page and please try again!
formPage.formSucces: Your message has been received! Thank you for the feedback!

item1.headline: Cats opinion's virtual strategy
item1.text: Our policy is to offer users safe experience and respect their privacy. This is why we don't collect any unnecessary data. We will be very open and informative about anything we might collect. Cats' opinion does not store users personal data (read email below).
item1.quote: -Website should be for user, user should not be data source!

item2.headline: What user data we store?
item2.text: Cats Opinion does not collect or store any sensitive/personal user data! We have worked very hard to avoid cookie usage and data gathering! We have developed our own analytic tool that does not need any user data to function!

item3.headline: Users email addresses
item3.text: CatsOpinion does not store or distribute those email addresses to anyone. When a user wants to be contacted and leaves an email at the contact page, the email address is stored only as long as necessary to communicate. After that email address will be removed from our systems permanently and never seen again. Contacting can also be done anonymously or via email at dev@catsopinion.com.

item4.headline: What 3rd party cookies we have?
item4.text: None, we avoid cookies as long it is possible!

item6.headline: What is best type of cookie in world?

header.headline: The head writer: Vilma
header.subheader1content: I am a female cat from finland. I live in a small town where the population is somewhere around 5 576. I'm born somewhere around 2018 and I celebrate my birthday on my calendar name day may 26. I like normal cat stuff sleeping, eating, hunting and playing. I'm very independent and nobody pushes me around. I live in a good home and wanted to start sharing things about my life and spread knowledge about cats in general!
header.subheader2: How does cat write a blog?
header.subheader2content: I have a handy human helper (read slave). He is my ghost writer and also does websites coding and other development. We have meetings about blog direction and upcoming posts. i've even allowed him to have his own section called appz.
header.subheader3content: Everyday cat stuff like sleeping or squirrel chasing, whatever pops to mind. We also write about general cat care, tips for new cat owners and cats as species. Basically just cat stuff! We came up with this concept called series so our posts inside one series are linked together so they are easy to digest in little smaller portions and more comfy to follow through.

weatherApp.name: Weather app
weatherApp.description: Ask Vilma bot how she feels about weather! App also gives you useful facts and of course weather opinions from vilma!

home.title: #1 Cat Blog in the World
home.description: Cats opinion is new and modern cat blog! Learn about cats and get cat care tips. Try our apps and gain more information about cats!

blog.title: Learn About Cats In Blog
blog.description: It is all about cats. You will learn information about cats and get a peek into cats day to day life! Vilma the cat supervises everything we publish!

contact.title: Contact And Give Us Feedback!
contact.description: Tell us what went wrong or what was good! Any feedback will be highly appreciated by Cats opinion no matter if it is positive or negative.

appz.title: Cat Apps Are Here!
appz.description: Cats opinion develops and publishes informative apps about cats! Apps are meant to be informative and fun! Try them out and don't forget to give us feedback!

privacypolicy.title: Our Privacy Policy For You
privacypolicy.description: Cats opinions privacy policy. Privacy is important for us and we want to be honest and transparent about what is going on.

header.home: The only opinion cat owners need!
header.appz: The appz zone, play with the apps!

cookiebanner.p1: Cats' opinion values your privacy! We don’t serve any unnecessary cookies or cookies that collect personal data!
